captions.text:
And I'm Dick Simmons from
the same show.

Now I know what you're thinking:
how does this blue guy have time

to star in such hilarious
internet videos when he's so
busy being a space-faring,

sword wielding, super-soldier
chick magnet?

And you're probably asking
yourself a similar question
about me.

I mean, let's be honest, all the
ladies are lining up to get
some Dick... Simmons!

Well the answer to your question
is years of experience! Which
is why I'm here to tell you

fellas how to score the ladies
when you're out on the town!

And due to my years of
experience with the internet,
I'm here to inform you all

about the technologically
superior form of social
interaction: online dating!

Now the first step to hooking up
with a hot girl is knowing
where to look.

Typically, the best place to
start going on the prowl is
at a night club.

Be sure to find the darkest one
with the loudest music and the
biggest crowds.

Hey bro, you're holdin' up
the line!

Come on man, I'm trying to
do a thing.

Why does the club have to
be dark?

I'm glad you asked, Simmons!
Studies show that poor lighting
conceals blemishes and

improves appearances by
35 percent, so all club patrons
immediately seem more attractive
than they actually are.
HEY, YOU LOOK HOT!

THANKS! IT'S PROBABLY BECAUSE
YOU CAN'T SEE MY HORRIFIC
FACIAL SCAR! HAHA!

Loud music is key because it
eliminates the possibility of a
conversation going beyond

superficial small-talk. Does she
want to talk about something you
don't care for?

Just act like you can't
hear her.
IS THAT A HORRIFIC FACIAL SCAR?
YEAH, THIS SONG IS GREAT!

And lastly, the larger the
crowd the better. Statistically
speaking, the more people

there are, the better your
chances are of getting laid.
That's just science!

Alternatively, you can use the
miracle of the web to search
for a soulmate from the comfort

of your own home. Nowadays
there's a plethora of dating
resources to choose from

like Match.com, OKCupid,
or even Craigslist! But if
you're like me and want to

keep social interaction to a
minimum, then there's always
good ol' Tinder!

Please Simmons, tell us
more about this “Tinder”.

Personally, I swipe “yes” for
every woman because it's
more efficient than taking

the time to judge each
individual female. I've
averaged 134 swipes per minute!

I like the way you think,
Simmons.

Eventually, if someone swipes
you into their “yes” category,

you're matched with them
in a private chat.

Which brings us to our next
topic: Talking to women.

When matched with someone
on Tinder, immediately send
them a message to show them

your go-getter attitude.
If they don't respond within
a few seconds, continue

sending them messages.
They are either testing you
or they may just be shy,

so comfort them with a
wide variety of emoji
and emoticons.

Does eight, equal sign,
equal sign, equal sign,
equal sign, equal sign,

capital D count as an emoticon?
Bow chicka bow wow.

Don't be afraid to ask your
match the hard-hitting
questions.

You'll want to establish an
emotional connection right
off the bat, so really get into

the intimate details of their
lives. Things like, “Where
do you live?” or “What's

your relationship like with your
father?” Soon, they'll be
dying to meet you in real life.

Once you've spotted a mark
at the club, take the time to
appreciate their body.

They've worked hard for it, so
show them that you're impressed
by staring them up and down.

After an appropriate 5 to 30
minutes of admiring their body,
approach the female.

You can then make your
presence known by delivering
a well thought-out and rehearsed
pick up line, such as...

HEY HOT STUFF! NICE LEGS!
What time do they open?
SO WE CAN--

OHHHH, THAT'S GONNA
LEAVE A HORRIFIC SCAR!

Remember: If at first you don't
succeed, there's probably a
hospital nearby!

If you've followed my step-by-
step guide, you should be well
on your way to a fiery night

with at least two Brazilian
super-models.

And if you've followed my guide,
you will have arranged a
date with one of your matches.

Hopefully someplace classy.
Not super classy, though.
Just like... a place with
unlimited salad and breadsticks.

But in the event that you
haven't sealed the deal with
any super-models, because

you royally screwed up my
bulletproof advice, you can
always try to salvage the night

by finding the emotionally
vulnerable.

Hey sweet cheeks, you seem
upset. Anything I can do for
you?

I was meeting someone on
a date, but it looks like
they ditched me.

She sent a winky smiley
face! This is getting too
serious!

So there you have it. With a
little practice,

you'll be reeling in all
the ladies at the club.

And once you've exhausted
every potential match on Tinder,

you can move onto another
dating application.
Like Hot or Not!
Hey, are you ScilonSlayer19?
GOTTA GO.

Wait! You get over here
right now!

Psh. Some dudes just don't
get women like I do.

Lavernius Tucker: Love
Doctor Extraordin--
OOPH!

Nobody here had a problem
with that, right?

- Not at all.
- Nope!

title: Red vs. Blue Season 12 - PSA: Match Breaking
